item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact Job Inquires Job related inquires can be made on LinkedIn. Open Source Work Questions related to open source work should be made on GitHub.

item.title: Bio
item.description: Bio I am a Senior Site Reliability Engineer currently working at Red Hat helping build and deploy reliable, secure, and scalable managed services on top of Managed OpenShift. Work Experience Red Hat Inc. Senior Site Reliability Engineer (Oct 2022 - Present) Led a global SRE team deploying and running managed offerings on top of OpenShift. Served as a functional team lead to manage region-based initiatives and lend technical expertise to drive solutions.
